title: Anniversary Missions
body: Just had a quick question, I missed out on the start of the 11 day mission campaign, is it possible for me to get the other mission rewards before the end of the event or are they done?

replies.body: Hey Nadine Wolf, even if you missed a few days, you should be able to complete all the missions in time if you started yesterday. Keep in mind that the missions end mid-November; more context can be found on the Support Site: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360036377774-Let-s-Celebrate-10-Years-of-League-

Hey there!  The answer is you can, Riot wanted to give gifts as a thank you to the players, so they made sure it would be a no-stress experience without worries over things like missing a day or being away at the time.

Is there a reason ur match making is shit?? im asking because I dnt see teh point in having high win rate when u are place with fuckers purposely to lower it?? Should I just start running it down mid? is that the only way to enjoy the game? I just dnt get how an adc is suppose to rank up  when ur gettin trolled 90% of the games played?? its what ever right u all dnt care which is why all post like this just get deleted..
I rushed my missions and got a Legendary Skin for an unowned Champion. I meditated for 2 hours before sending a ticket.
